title: Quick Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: ['15g butter', '1 small onion, chopped', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '1.5L chicken stock', '400ml vegetable stock', '225g cooked chicken breast, chopped', '55g egg noodles', '120g carrots, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste']
